Subject: Browser based application blocked
Description: We have several web based applications hosted internally domains http://mcbappsXXX with varying numbers from MCBAPPS101 to MCBAPPS204. Despite the wildcard being added to our DPI allowlist like http://mcbapps* uploads and file transfers to these applications are still being blocked by our CAP Policy. Please advice if there is a different syntax needed as these are necessary applications.
What_We_Know__c:
the allowlist is set correctly, the policy is correct, and it has the allowlist assigned.
they are using some internal tools accessed through the browser and it is still triggering for uploads
logs were enabled so I am hoping that the issue was caught and I can figure this one out.
Solution_Comment__c: re-enabling DPI and re-assigning the allowlist fixed the issue
